SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.net

Interface RmiServerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RmiServerImpl
public interface RmiServerInterface extends Remote
The RmiServerInterface interface defines the remote methods that can be invoked on an RMI server. These methods are used for gameplay interactions and communication with other players.

  • Method Details

    • dragTilesToBookShelf

      void dragTilesToBookShelf(List<Coordinate> chosenTiles, int chosenColumn) throws RemoteException
      Drags the chosen tiles from the board to the bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      chosenTiles - The list of coordinates representing the chosen tiles.
      chosenColumn - The chosen column on the bookshelf.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • joinGame

      void joinGame(String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Joins a player to the game
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • createGame

      void createGame(String nickname, int numberOfPlayer) throws RemoteException
      Creates a new game
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the first player
      numberOfPlayer - the number of players of the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • quitGame

      void quitGame() throws RemoteException
      allows to quit the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • sentMessage

      void sentMessage(String text, String[] receiversNickname) throws RemoteException
      Allows to send a message from sender to receiver/s
      Parameters:
      text - the message to be sent
      receiversNickname - nicknames of receivers
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • nop

      void nop() throws RemoteException
      nop operation to keep the connection alive
